content.text:
[cron:8b380d56-7314-4ba9-b4c4-ea11d3e5ca6f PR Review Patrol (High Frequency)] PR patrol for bills-bot.

Repo: /home/bill/.openclaw/workspace-build/bills-bot/

‚ö†Ô∏è CRITICAL RULE: Only check PRs authored by Bill (BillChirico) or by Pip Build / sub-agents. Do NOT check, fix, or address PRs from anyone else (other contributors, bots like coderabbitai, dependabot[bot], renovate[bot]) unless Bill has explicitly told you to.

Do this each run:
1) List open PRs in BillChirico/bills-bot.
2) Filter to ONLY Bill's PRs and Pip Build's PRs. Skip everything else.
3) For eligible PRs, count unresolved review threads.
4) If no unresolved threads on eligible PRs: respond exactly `NO_REPLY`.
5) If unresolved threads exist:
   - Spawn ONE sub-agent PER PR (parallel), never batch PRs together.
   - Use agentId `build`, model `anthropic/claude-opus-4-6`, thinking `high`.
   - Include full unresolved thread details (thread id, file path, line, issue summary).
   - Instruct spawned agents to read and follow CODING.md, fix all review comments (including nitpicks unless nonsensical/breaking/redundant), run tests/coverage, resolve threads.
   - Instruct spawned agents NOT to post PR summary comments unless Bill explicitly asks.
   - Have spawned agents report completion summary back to parent agent.
   - After spawning, send Bill a concise Discord DM status update:
     - channel: discord
     - target: user:191633014441115648
     - accountId: pip-build
     - include PR numbers and unresolved thread counts.
6) If any spawned run fails/stalls, note it in DM and respawn once.

Keep updates concise and action-oriented.
Current time: Monday, February 16th, 2026 ‚Äî 10:27 PM (America/New_York)

content.text:
[cron:8b380d56-7314-4ba9-b4c4-ea11d3e5ca6f PR Review Patrol (High Frequency)] PR patrol for bills-bot.

Repo: /home/bill/.openclaw/workspace-build/bills-bot/

‚ö†Ô∏è CRITICAL RULE: Only check PRs authored by Bill (BillChirico) or by Pip Build / sub-agents. Do NOT check, fix, or address PRs from anyone else (other contributors, bots like coderabbitai, dependabot[bot], renovate[bot]) unless Bill has explicitly told you to.

Do this each run:
1) List open PRs in BillChirico/bills-bot.
2) Filter to ONLY Bill's PRs and Pip Build's PRs. Skip everything else.
3) For eligible PRs, count unresolved review threads.
4) If no unresolved threads on eligible PRs: respond exactly `NO_REPLY`.
5) If unresolved threads exist:
   - Spawn ONE sub-agent PER PR (parallel), never batch PRs together.
   - Use agentId `build`, model `anthropic/claude-opus-4-6`, thinking `high`.
   - Include full unresolved thread details (thread id, file path, line, issue summary).
   - Instruct spawned agents to read and follow CODING.md, fix all review comments (including nitpicks unless nonsensical/breaking/redundant), run tests/coverage, resolve threads.
   - Instruct spawned agents NOT to post PR summary comments unless Bill explicitly asks.
   - Have spawned agents report completion summary back to parent agent.
   - After spawning, send Bill a concise Discord DM status update:
     - channel: discord
     - target: user:191633014441115648
     - accountId: pip-build
     - include PR numbers and unresolved thread counts.
6) If any spawned run fails/stalls, note it in DM and respawn once.

Keep updates concise and action-oriented.
Current time: Monday, February 16th, 2026 ‚Äî 10:27 PM (America/New_York)

arguments.command:
cd /home/bill/.openclaw/workspace-build/bills-bot && \
gh pr list --state open --json number,title,author,headRefName --jq '.[] | select(.author.login == "BillChirico" or .author.login == "PipBuild")' | while read pr; do
  PR_NUM=$(echo "$pr" | jq -r '.number')
  PR_TITLE=$(echo "$pr" | jq -r '.title')
  PR_BRANCH=$(echo "$pr" | jq -r '.headRefName')
  
  # Paginate through ALL review threads
  CURSOR=""
  TOTAL_UNRESOLVED=0
  THREADS_JSON="[]"
  while true; do
    if [ -z "$CURSOR" ]; then
      RESULT=$(gh api graphql -f query="{repository(owner:\"BillChirico\",name:\"bills-bot\"){pullRequest(number:$PR_NUM){reviewThreads(first:100){pageInfo{hasNextPage endCursor} nodes{id isResolved diffSide originalLine line path comments(last:1){nodes{body author{login}}}}}}}}")
    else
      RESULT=$(gh api graphql -f query="{repository(owner:\"BillChirico\",name:\"bills-bot\"){pullRequest(number:$PR_NUM){reviewThreads(first:100,after:\"$CURSOR\"){pageInfo{hasNextPage endCursor} nodes{id isResolved diffSide originalLine line path comments(last:1){nodes{body author{login}}}}}}}}")
    fi
    
    # Extract unresolved threads and their details
    PAGE_THREADS=$(echo "$RESULT" | jq -c '.data.repository.pullRequest.reviewThreads.nodes | map(select(.isResolved == false))')
    THREADS_JSON=$(echo "$THREADS_JSON $PAGE_THREADS" | jq -s 'add')
    
    PAGE_UNRESOLVED=$(echo "$PAGE_THREADS" | jq 'length')
    TOTAL_UNRESOLVED=$((TOTAL_UNRESOLVED + PAGE_UNRESOLVED))
    
    HAS_NEXT=$(echo "$RESULT" | jq -r '.data.repository.pullRequest.reviewThreads.pageInfo.hasNextPage')
    if [ "$HAS_NEXT" = "true" ]; then
      CURSOR=$(echo "$RESULT" | jq -r '.data.repository.pullRequest.reviewThreads.pageInfo.endCursor')
    else
      break
    fi
  done
  
  echo "PR_DATA: {\"number\": $PR_NUM, \"title\": \"$PR_TITLE\", \"branch\": \"$PR_BRANCH\", \"unresolvedCount\": $TOTAL_UNRESOLVED, \"threads\": $THREADS_JSON}"
done

cd /home/bill/.openclaw/workspace-build/bills-bot && \
gh pr list --state open --json number,title,author,headRefName --jq '.[] | select(.author.login == "BillChirico" or .author.login == "PipBuild")' | while read pr; do
  PR_NUM=$(echo "$pr" | jq -r '.number')
  PR_TITLE=$(echo "$pr" | jq -r '.title')
  PR_BRANCH=$(echo "$pr" | jq -r '.headRefName')
  
  CURSOR=""
  TOTAL_UNRESOLVED=0
  THREADS_JSON="[]"
  while true; do
    if [ -z "$CURSOR" ]; then
      QUERY="{repository(owner:\"BillChirico\",name:\"bills-bot\"){pullRequest(number:$PR_NUM){reviewThreads(first:100){pageInfo{hasNextPage endCursor} nodes{id isResolved diffSide originalLine line path comments(last:1){nodes{body author{login}}}}}}}}"
    else
      QUERY="{repository(owner:\"BillChirico\",name:\"bills-bot\"){pullRequest(number:$PR_NUM){reviewThreads(first:100,after:\"$CURSOR\"){pageInfo{hasNextPage endCursor} nodes{id isResolved diffSide originalLine line path comments(last:1){nodes{body author{login}}}}}}}}"
    fi
    
    RESULT=$(gh api graphql -f query="$QUERY")
    
    PAGE_THREADS=$(echo "$RESULT" | jq -c '.data.repository.pullRequest.reviewThreads.nodes | map(select(.isResolved == false))')
    THREADS_JSON=$(echo "$THREADS_JSON $PAGE_THREADS" | jq -s 'add')
    
    PAGE_UNRESOLVED=$(echo "$PAGE_THREADS" | jq 'length')
    TOTAL_UNRESOLVED=$((TOTAL_UNRESOLVED + PAGE_UNRESOLVED))
    
    HAS_NEXT=$(echo "$RESULT" | jq -r '.data.repository.pullRequest.reviewThreads.pageInfo.hasNextPage')
    if [ "$HAS_NEXT" = "true" ]; then
      CURSOR=$(echo "$RESULT" | jq -r '.data.repository.pullRequest.reviewThreads.pageInfo.endCursor')
    else
      break
    fi
  done
  
  echo "PR_DATA: {\"number\": $PR_NUM, \"title\": \"$PR_TITLE\", \"branch\": \"$PR_BRANCH\", \"unresolvedCount\": $TOTAL_UNRESOLVED, \"threads\": $THREADS_JSON}"
done

cd /home/bill/.openclaw/workspace-build/bills-bot && \
gh pr list --state open --json number,author,title,headRefName
